Class Dishwasher

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
        • components.Dishwasher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.EmbeddingComponentAccessI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, DishwasherI, java.rmi.Remote
    public class Dishwasher
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
implements DishwasherI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.EmbeddingComponentAccessI
    The class Dishwasher implements a dishwasher component that will hold the dishwasher simulation model.

    Invariant

     invariant              true
